response.overview: Wizard People, Dear Reader, released in 2004, is an unauthorized alternative soundtrack to Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, written by Brad Neely, a comic book artist from Fort Smith, Arkansas.  Wizard People, Dear Reader is a narrative retelling of the lives of the characters of The Philosopher's Stone and the world in which they live. Presented in the form of a thirty-five chapter audiobook, this soundtrack is intended to replace the film's audio track.
response.tagline: An alternate audio track to Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's (nee Philosophers) Stone, essentially turning the movie into a comedy.
response.title: Wizard People, Dear Reader
